attributes.action: Limit who can vote in government elections to taxpayers only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, people who do not pay income tax get to say how public monies are used.  We propose that only people who have paid income tax for at least 9 of the previous 12 months prior to election are allowed to vote for the government they prefer to run our country, and hence spend taxpayers hard-earned cash.
